meanings.definition: A South African shrub with aromatic leaves used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: The buchu plant grows in South Africa and has fragrant leaves.
meanings.sent2: I brewed a tea using buchu leaves for its medicinal properties.
meanings.sent3: The buchu plant whispered to the other herbs about its healing powers.
meanings.sent4: Herbalists treasure buchu like a precious gem for its healing properties.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of buchu filled the room, calming everyone instantly.

meanings.definition: A medicinal preparation made from the leaves of the buchu plant.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother gave me a bottle of buchu medicine for my cough.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist recommended a buchu extract for my stomach ache.
meanings.sent3: The buchu potion tasted surprisingly sweet, like a secret remedy.
meanings.sent4: The buchu elixir worked like magic, soothing all ailments.
meanings.sent5: The healing power of buchu spread through my body, relieving pain.
